Browse the source code of netbsd/external/bsd/wpa/dist/src/eap_common/chap.c

1/*
2 * CHAP-MD5 (RFC 1994)
3 * Copyright (c) 2007-2009, Jouni Malinen <j@w1.fi>
4 *
5 * This software may be distributed under the terms of the BSD license.
6 * See README for more details.
7 */
8
9#include "includes.h"
10
11#include "common.h"
12#include "crypto/crypto.h"
13#include "chap.h"
14
15int chap_md5(u8 id, const u8 *secret, size_t secret_len, const u8 *challenge,
16 size_t challenge_len, u8 *response)
17{
18 const u8 *addr[3];
19 size_t len[3];
20
21 addr[0] = &id;
22 len[0] = 1;
23 addr[1] = secret;
24 len[1] = secret_len;
25 addr[2] = challenge;
26 len[2] = challenge_len;
27 return md5_vector(3, addr, len, response);
28}
29
